overview: 2011 Marketer of the Year (American Business Awards) specializing in Marketing, User Experience, and Social Media. Formerly with SaaS firm, PlanSource, Stephen and fellow tech entrepreneurs have recently launched Corkcicle (www.corkcicle.com) a novelty gift item for wine drinkers. Relying heavily on technology and social media as a platform for growth and with a target market of technologists that love wine or think wine is too stuffy, Stephen and team are focused on creating a buzz in this market.
